name: Razorfish Health
description:
Most ad agencies claim to be full service but digital integration was just an afterthought. Razorfish Health was born digital. Early on, we knew integrating the best business expertise, creative, UX, strategy, analytics and global media savvy, made us unique. We are more than a digital agency. We are a uniquely integrated partner for a uniquely complex health and wellness industry. Razorfish Health is a member of the world’s largest healthcare communications network, Publicis Health.
We have offices in New York and Philadelphia to serve your every communication’s need. Our teams create brand experiences informed by deep behavioral and data-driven truths to help ensure your success in an ever-evolving, multipoint healthcare ecosystem. Paris-based Publicis Groupe S.A. (Euronext Paris: FR0000130577), is the world’s third largest communications group, second largest media counsel and buying group, and a global leader in digital and healthcare communications.
READ MORE...
